detail_desc: Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Short skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and a raw-edge hem.
Straight-cut coat in soft, felted fabric with notch lapels, concealed press-studs at the front and welt side pockets. Lined.

Sleeveless body in glittery jersey with a V-neck and a round cut-out section with a covered metal ring at the front. Adjustable, spaghetti shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless top in a crêpe weave with a V-shaped opening at the front, small stand-up collar, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.

Straight-cut, sleeveless blouse in softly draping satin with sequined and beaded embroidery at the top. Draping at the front of the neckline and a concealed zip at the back of the neck. Lined at the top.
Top in slub-weave jersey with a reversible-sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size 1½-3Y) and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif and ribbed neckline.
V-neck satin cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length sweatpants in sturdy jersey with side stripes in a contrasting colour. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front.
Cap in woven fabric with a motif and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Cap in cotton twill with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Hat in a supersoft, brushed knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Top in supersoft jersey with a brushed finish. Long, wide puff sleeves and trims around the neckline and cuffs.
Tops in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a button placket, long, cuffed sleeves and a rounded hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and lined gusset. Sculpting effect on the waist, seat and hips.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist.

Longer-style cardigan in a rib knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, welt side pockets and a zip down the front. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in wide wale corduroy made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and wide sleeves with buttons at the cuffs.

Lightly padded parka in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, faux fur-lined hood with a foldover edge, patch on one sleeve and a zip and quilted wind flap with press-studs down the front. Drawstring at the waist, flap side pockets with a press-stud and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Partly lined in faux fur.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, leggings and hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Fitted cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Cap in a cotton weave with a practical flap at the back to protect the ears and back of the neck.
Blouse in a cotton weave with an embroidered pattern, round neckline with elastication front and back, and short puff sleeves.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Hooded top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck, wide, bell sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Short shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, knot detail at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, gathers at the top, a racer back and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist.

Long, oversized jumper in fine-knit wool with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slit at the cuffs and in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Rain jacket designed to fit a small dog with a collar, a hole for a leash and a hook and loop fastening at the neck. Belt with reflective strips and a hook and loop fastening at the waist. Soft fleece inside.
Tights in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the tights is recycled.
Trousers in stretch cotton twill. High waist with an extended waistband, zip fly, side and back pockets and straight, ankle-length legs with creases and wide turn-ups.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Set with a top and pair of shorts in crinkled jersey. Top with a narrow trim around the neckline and short, flounce-trimmed sleeves. Shorts with smocked elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and a decorative bow at the front. The cotton content of the top and shorts is organic.

Padded, quilted coat in woven fabric with a detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, flap patch pockets, a drawstring at the waist and soft inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

prod_name: Cali HW wide leg dnm trs
detail_desc: 5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs.

Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre with lace trims and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide elastic hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
One-shoulder, knee-length dress in jersey with pleats at the top and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Lined.
Calf-length, pleated, bell-shaped skirt in satin. High waist with elastication at the back and a concealed zip in one side.
Large, block-coloured scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with narrow tie shoulder straps and an opening with a tie at the front. Small frills on the front and back. Unlined.
Blouse in an airy linen and cotton weave with a deep V-neck, buttons down the front, short, wide sleeves and ties at the hem. Unlined.

Long-sleeved dress in patterned, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and press-studs at the top. Kangaroo pocket, ribbing at the cuffs and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace and microfibre with lightly padded, moulded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem, and a wide strap with three pairs of hooks and eyes at the back.
Bra in microfibre with lace trims and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Captain's cap in a cotton weave with a twisted band at the front and metal buttons at the sides. Lined.
Fitted, long-sleeved body in ribbed jersey with a round neck and cut-out section at the back. Concealed press-studs at the crotch, high cut legs and a high cut at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Medium support.
Off-the-shoulder top in a viscose weave with smocking at the top and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elastication and a wide flounce at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Sandals with a heel strap with covered elastic at the back. Imitation leather insoles.
Ballet pumps in shimmering metallic imitation leather with a glittery elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Bomber jacket in soft faux fur with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip with a pendant in the shape of a pixelated speech bubble, pockets in the side seams, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Satin lining.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Smocked strappy top in a cotton weave with frill trims and wide, tie-top shoulder straps.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and ribbed hems.

Ankle-length dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and covered buttons at the top. Gathers at the shoulders, long raglan sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a flounce-trimmed seam with sewn-on ties at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey, one patterned.
Leggings in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides of the legs.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an open chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shell trousers in wind- and waterproof breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Adjustable elasticated waist, a reflective strip on one leg and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
V-neck T-shirt in cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a decorative bow at the neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Belts in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 3.2 cm.

Lace dress with a gentle V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top. Concealed zip at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Cotton jersey lining.
Pyjamas with a short-sleeved top and pair of shorts in soft jersey. Top with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

prod_name: DeLuca pull on TVP RW TVP
detail_desc: Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Tube scarf in soft, garter-stitched cotton with ribbed trims at the ends and a small imitation leather appliqué.
Thigh boots in imitation leather with a soft shaft. Linings and insoles in recycled polyester, and chunky soles. Height of soles 4.5 cm.
Platform sandals with a braided jute trim around the soles and narrow suede straps that cross over the foot and tie around the ankle. Rubber soles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm. Heel 5 cm.
Fitted top in soft wool jersey.
